text:
I see my nodes came up with sledgehammer, then I figured I'd try and deploy Ubuntu on there, but it got stuck trying to find an NTP server.  I walked away and eventually the kvm consoles went blank and I couldn't get them out of the blank state.  DR shows the nodes as green.  It doesn't appear the NTP service is running on there when running docker-admin.  How do I bring that up?
```
dev@Z640-extra:~/digitalrebar/deploy/compose$ docker-compose ps
```

very strange!  you should be able to docker-compose ntp up -d.  When you install, using --con-ntp should work; however, it should be included in your default set
check the NTP role in the system deployment
and see how that is set, but it should have have turned green if the service was missing unless you picked external ntp.
